document_data.caption: A map showing Toadstool Thicket south of Aspenheight.
document_data.name: Toadstool Thicket
document_data.mainbody: '''Toadstool Thicket''' was a small forest located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Toadstool Thicket sat in the shadow of the southern slopes of [[Aspenheight]] in western Gwynneth just west of the [[Aspenheight Gap]]. Two tributaries of an unnamed river cut through the forest on their way down from the mountain to the [[Strait of the Leviathan]]. Toadstool Thicket was approximately {{SI|15|mi|k|long=yes}} long.
document_data.Notable Locations: A single [[Moonwell]] was found within the forest.
